Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus Prime: I think we can safely destroy this Unicron. I think he is coming from our time, through the transwarp rift. The space gun is worth a shot but I have thought about the Matrix. We believe it's lost on cybertron. I want a multi-faction team to go after it.


Polar Claw <cycodrone@...> wrote:
Shadowcaster had observed everything quietly. He knew
there was only one thing that could truly stop the
madness inside Azure growing any larger- the very same
thing that was their only hope of defeating Unicron.
Turning away from Cheetor, he faced Deathstar. 

"Your plan is flawed Tripred. There is but one way to
defeat Unicron.  If you had been alive to face this
you would know this for yourself. As for you Rodimus,
I am surprised. Considering that you yourself fought
Unicron in the Earth year AD2005, I would have thought
you of all Cybertronians woulde no that nothing short
of the Matrix of Leadership will destroy the chaos
bringer. However I warn all of you that if Unicron is
Destroyed here, then the futurew will be errevocably
changed. If Maximals and Predacons destroy Unicron
here, resulting in them being from a future that never
was, then the very space time continuum could destroy
itself from the resulting paradox.  As for the
location of the Matrix itself, my spark was sent from
its resting place in the Matrix of your present day.
Primus himself gave me its current location. I can
tell you now though that you wont like the answer
though Rodimus."

Shadowcaster waits for a reply.
